 上一个类   下一个类 框架    无框架

src.main.searchWord
类 WordIndexLoader

java.lang.Object
  src.main.searchWord.WordIndexLoader
所有已实现的接口：
Subject
public class WordIndexLoader
extends java.lang.Object
implements Subject

作者：
dxz WordIndexLoader works as a subject of observer pattern to control the searching contents update

构造方法摘要
WordIndexLoader(java.lang.String indexDir)
          Create a file input stream to get index

 boolean canStop()
          Implements Subject

          This method will update the data when get a line and autostop when the observer list is empty

          Implements Subject

          Implements Subject

          Implements Subject
